articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: Europe leans on SpaceX to bridge launcher gap - SpaceNews
articles.description: Europe, temporarily lacking its own space access, will rely more on SpaceX for key science and navigation missions while restoring its launch capabilities.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Europe, temporarily lacking its own access to space, plans to rely more on SpaceX to launch key science and navigation spacecraft while working to restore its launch capabilities.
